tools.name: send_whatsapp_message
tools.description: Send a WhatsApp message to a specific phone number or group using WaPulse API

tools.name: send_whatsapp_files
tools.description: Send files (images, documents, etc.) to a specific phone number or group using WaPulse API

tools.name: send_whatsapp_audio
tools.description: Send audio messages (voice notes, music, etc.) to a specific phone number or group using WaPulse API

tools.name: load_chat_messages
tools.description: Retrieve all messages from a specific chat or conversation using WaPulse API

tools.name: check_id_exists
tools.description: Check if a specific user or group ID exists in WhatsApp using WaPulse API

tools.name: validate_phone_number
tools.description: Validate if a phone number is in the correct format for WaPulse API

tools.name: get_all_chats
tools.description: Get all WhatsApp chats (individual and group conversations) for an instance using WaPulse API

tools.name: get_wapulse_documentation
tools.description: Fetch and search WaPulse API documentation from the official website

tools.name: create_whatsapp_group
tools.description: Create a new WhatsApp group with specified participants

tools.name: add_group_participants
tools.description: Add new participants to an existing WhatsApp group

tools.name: remove_group_participants
tools.description: Remove participants from an existing WhatsApp group

tools.name: promote_group_participants
tools.description: Promote participants to admin status in a WhatsApp group

tools.name: demote_group_participants
tools.description: Demote participants from admin status in a WhatsApp group

tools.name: leave_whatsapp_group
tools.description: Leave a WhatsApp group

tools.name: get_group_invite_link
tools.description: Get the invite link for a WhatsApp group

tools.name: change_group_invite_code
tools.description: Change the invite code for a WhatsApp group, generating a new invite link

tools.name: get_group_requests
tools.description: Get pending join requests for a WhatsApp group

tools.name: reject_group_request
tools.description: Reject pending join requests for a WhatsApp group

tools.name: approve_group_request
tools.description: Approve pending join requests for a WhatsApp group

tools.name: get_all_groups
tools.description: Get all WhatsApp groups for an instance

tools.name: create_instance
tools.description: Create a new WhatsApp instance

tools.name: get_qr_code
tools.description: Get QR code for WhatsApp Web connection

tools.name: start_instance
tools.description: Start a WhatsApp instance to begin receiving and sending messages

tools.name: stop_instance
tools.description: Stop a running WhatsApp instance

tools.name: delete_instance
tools.description: Permanently delete a WhatsApp instance

server_info_crawled.name: WaPulse Whatsapp MCP Server
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide an MCP server interface for the WaPulse WhatsApp Web API, enabling integration and interaction with WhatsApp Web through the Model Context Protocol. Facilitate seamless communication and automation for clients using MCP-compatible tools and resources.
